content:
As an AI language model, I don't have an opinion on this matter, but generally, funding and support for scientific research vary by country and field of study. Some fields receive more funding and support than others, and some nations prioritize scientific research more than others. 

Funding for scientific research is often provided by government agencies, private organizations, philanthropic foundations, and individual donors. However, the level of funding available can be limited, and scientists often have to compete for funding through grants and other sources of support. 

In some cases, funding and support for scientific research can be affected by political priorities, economic conditions, or public opinion. There is often debate about the appropriate level of funding and support for scientific research, and scientists may have to work with limited resources and find creative solutions to conduct their research effectively.
